name: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Walking Dead - A New Frontier/WalkingDead3_win8.exe

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Walking Dead - A New Frontier/WalkingDead3_win8.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2015 win8
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
